REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0523 reute u f BC-DANAHER-CORP-<DHR>-4T 03-04 0041

TEXT.TITLE: DANAHER CORP <DHR> 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 71 cts vs 43 cts Net 7,274,000 vs 4,447,000 Rev 161.6 mln vs 77.6 mln Year Shr 1.51 dlrs vs 1.32 dlrs Net 15,401,000 vs 13,525,000 Rev 454.0 mln vs 304.9 mln NOTE: Fourth qtr net includes extraordinary gain of 3.8 mln dlrs, or 37 cts per share, versus 2.9 mln dlrs, or 28 cts a share, in 1985's fourth qtr, and an extraordinary charge of 642,000 dlrs, or six cts a share. 1986 net includes extraordinary gain of 7.4 mln dlrs, or 72 cts a share, versus 8.0 mln dlrs, or 78 cts a share, in 1985. Reuter
